data.name: The Importance of Secure Remote Working Solutions
data.summary:
Topics Covered:
1. How the security landscape of businesses has evolved with remote working.
2. Security blindspots while working on remote working solutions.
3. Security strategies to align with remote working practices.
4. Best remote working practices to strengthen security compliance.
5. How Cisco Webex’s remote working solutions ensure security along with productivity.
